transportAdvice: Sofia has a well-developed public transit network including a metro, trams, and buses that connect most tourist areas efficiently and affordably. The city center is compact and walkable, and taxis are widely available for longer journeys or late-night travel.

weather.description: Cold and often grey with occasional snow, making it one of the chilliest months for visitors.
Still cold with possible snow and frost, though days gradually begin to lengthen.
Early spring brings milder temperatures but expect variable weather and occasional rain showers.
Pleasant spring conditions with blooming parks, though rain showers remain fairly common.
Warm and green with comfortable temperatures, making it an excellent month to explore the city on foot.
Warm early summer with occasional afternoon thunderstorms and long sunny days.
Hot and mostly sunny, the driest month of the year and ideal for outdoor sightseeing.
Continued hot and dry conditions similar to July, with long bright days and minimal rainfall.
Comfortable early autumn temperatures with occasional rain and a pleasant drop from summer heat.
Cooler and increasingly overcast with autumn foliage adding colour to the city's parks and surroundings.
Noticeably cold and damp with fog possible, signalling the approach of winter.
Cold winter month with possible snow and festive atmosphere in the city centre.
